Class PerformanceMetricDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.dao.AbstractGenericDAO
com.algonquin.www.dao.impl.PerformanceMetricDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PerformanceMetricDAO
public class PerformanceMetricDAOImpl extends AbstractGenericDAO implements PerformanceMetricDAO
Implementation of PerformanceMetricDAO to perform CRUD operations on PerformanceMetric entities using JDBC.

Utilizes DataSource for database connections.

Since:
2025-08-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
